site_name: Land Between A223 North Cray RoadTo Stable LaneNorth Cray RoadBexleyKent
description: Details of conditions 3 ( LEMP), 4 (PART Phase 1 works) (Ecology Monitoring Scheme), 6 (Construction Env. Mgt Plan), 7 (lighting strategy), 8 (Bird and Bat Nesting Boxes), 9 (Stage 1 WSI), 10 (acoustic fence), 11 (PART Phase 1 works) (Construction Logistics Plan), 13 (spoil/material) and 14 (PART Phase 1 works) (HGV turning measures) pursuant to planning permission reference 19/01579/FUL for the formation of a temporary access haul road from A223 North Cray Road to Stable Lane to provide temporary access for construction vehicles to the National Grid Hurst Substation site for the duration of the London Power Tunnels II project.
